meanings.definition: A type of biscuit or cookie.
meanings.sent1: I love to snack on bisks with my tea in the afternoon.
meanings.sent2: She baked a batch of delicious bisks for the school bake sale.
meanings.sent3: The bisks on the plate looked so tempting that I couldn't resist having one.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked bisks filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The golden bisks were perfectly crispy on the outside and soft on the inside.

meanings.definition: A small, flat, circular object used in board games.
meanings.sent1: The players moved their game pieces, or bisks, around the board strategically.
meanings.sent2: He collected colorful bisks from different board games as a hobby.
meanings.sent3: The bisk landed on the 'Go Back' square, causing much laughter among the players.
meanings.sent4: Her luck turned when she picked up the lucky bisk and advanced three spaces.
meanings.sent5: The shiny bisk gleamed under the bright lights of the game night.

meanings.definition: To cut or shape with a bisque.
meanings.sent1: She carefully bisks the clay to create intricate pottery designs.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor bisks the rough edges of the sculpture to refine its shape.
meanings.sent3: He playfully bisks a heart shape into the sand at the beach.
meanings.sent4: The chef bisks the dough into perfect circles for the pie crust.
meanings.sent5: With skilled hands, she bisks the paper into delicate origami figures.
